name: 2023 The 9th International Conference on Culture, Languages and Literature
content: Publication Information: The accepted and registered full papers of ICCLL 2023 will be published into International Journal of Languages, Literature and Linguistics (IJLLL) or International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET). International Journal of Languages, Literature and Linguistics (IJLLL) ISSN: 2382-6282 DOI: 10.18178/IJLLL Frequency: Quarterly Indexed by: Google Scholar, Crossref, CNKI Paper Template: http://www.iccll.org/IJLLL\_template.doc International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET) ISSN: 2010-3689 (Online) DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Frequency: Monthly Abstracting/ Indexing: Scopus (CiteScore 2021: 1.3), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Google Scholar Paper Template: http://www.iccll.org/IJIET\_template.doc
